sourcesContent: import { ViewIcon } from '@chakra-ui/icons'; import { Box, Image, Text } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import { Button, IconButton, Modal, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, ModalContent, ModalFooter, ModalHeader, ModalOverlay, useDisclosure } from '@chakra-ui/react' import React from 'react' const SettingsModal = ({ children }) => { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); return <> {children ? ({children}) : ( } onClick={onOpen} /> )} {user.name} Почта: {user.email} Роль: {user.role} Группа: {user.groupId} ; } export default SettingsModal;
